name: Small Islands (Random Videos)
description:
the only good thing in the game(the art) is from a asset pack made by cup noodle

this is a game with a ton of bugs in which you have to plant plants

left click to hoe, water, plant(you need fruit to plant) or collect(you have a inventory limit)

press e to eat a fruit to get time

the goal is to get as much fruit as possible

you are lost on a tiny island(perfect theme integration)

to see the timer and how many fruits you have you need to make it fullscreen. Im having resizing problems and its really late 

this is the first game i made that has animation

i had to make a custom image for the cover image because it was too fast-pasted and there were too many bugs to make a image in a normal game
